<script>
		
  function onDOMContentLoaded() {
   const $ = window.jQuery;
  
  

		  $('.nav-toggle').click(function(){
			//get collapse content selector
			var collapse_content_selector = $(this).attr('href');					
 
			//make the collapse content to be shown or hide
			var toggle_switch = $(this);
			$(collapse_content_selector).toggle(function(){
			  if($(this).css('display')=='none'){
                                //change the button label to be 'Show'
				toggle_switch.html('View Transcript');
			  }else{
                                //change the button label to be 'Hide'
				toggle_switch.html('Close Transcript');
			  }
			});
		  });
 
		
    
    }
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', onDOMContentLoaded);
		</script>
<style>
.round-border {
  border: 1px solid #eee;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  -webkit-border-radius: 4px;
  -moz-border-radius: 4px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.popup-transcript {
  display: none;
  border: 1px solid #bdbdbd;
  padding: 10px;
  margin: 10px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript"> var pageOptionsContentOverride = { title: "Taxol improves outcomes for patients fighting breast, ovarian, & other cancers. #NCIdiscovers" } </script>

<script type="text/javascript"> var pageOptionsContentOverride = { title: "8 years. 50k participants. Lung screening saves lives. How @theNCI supported a landmark cancer study. #NCIdiscovers" } </script>
